Posts.Content: sannie wrote: Hello, I've been reading posts here since I found you, a couple weeks ago, and finally decided to join.  My diagnosis came on March 18, 2010.  This past Friday was my first round of chemo - the doctors think this was the best route to take - chemo, surgery, then radiation. Doing pretty well with side effects so far, but have heard it usually takes a few days for them to really kick in.  Crossing my fingers every-which-a-way that it will be pretty tame, but going to take it as it comes! Hopefully down the road I will have some kind of wisdom to share with other new folks, the way you all are sharing yours with us "newbies" today.  sannie Dx 3/18/2010, IDC, 4cm, Grade 3, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: New here sannie hmh23
